meta.description: Get in touch with Nan Ayeyar for premium rice inquiries, orders, and customer support.

hero.title: Contact Us

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch

contactInfo.businessHoursValue:
Mon - Sat: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Sun: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our rice products and services.

q1.question: What types of rice do you offer?
q1.answer: We offer a wide variety of premium rice including jasmine, basmati, brown rice, and specialty varieties from local farmers.

q2.question: How do you ensure quality?
q2.answer: All our rice is carefully selected, tested for quality, and stored in optimal conditions to maintain freshness and nutritional value.

q3.question: Do you offer bulk orders?
q3.answer: Yes, we provide special pricing for bulk orders. Contact us for custom quantities and wholesale pricing.

q4.question: What are your delivery options?
q4.answer: We offer both cash on delivery (COD) and online transfer payment options with free delivery on orders over 300,000 MMK.

q5.question: How long does delivery take?
q5.answer: Standard delivery takes 2-3 business days within the city. Rural areas may take 3-5 business days.

q6.question: Can I track my order?
q6.answer: Yes, you can track your order status through your account dashboard or by contacting our customer service team.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.subjectMinLength: Subject must be at least 5 characters
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

meta.description: Learn about Nan Ayeyar's return and exchange policies. Easy returns within 7 days for quality issues.

hero.title: Returns & Exchanges
hero.subtitle: We stand behind the quality of our rice. Easy returns and exchanges for your peace of mind.

process.title: How to Return or Exchange
process.subtitle: Follow these simple steps to return or exchange your order

step1.title: Check Your Order
step1.description: Review your order and identify any quality issues or defects within 7 days of delivery.

step2.title: Contact Us
step2.description: Call us at +959754056707 or email riceshopucsp@gmail.com to initiate your return.

step3.title: Package & Send
step3.description: Package the items securely and we'll arrange pickup or provide return instructions.

step4.title: Receive Refund
step4.description: Once we receive and verify the return, we'll process your refund or exchange within 3-5 business days.

policies.title: Return Policies
policies.subtitle: Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction

timeframe.title: 7-Day Return Window
timeframe.description: Returns must be initiated within 7 days of delivery. Contact us immediately if you notice any quality issues.

condition.title: Product Condition
condition.description: Items must be in original packaging and unused. We accept returns for quality issues, wrong items, or damaged goods.

guarantee.title: Quality Guarantee
guarantee.description: We guarantee the quality of our rice. If you're not satisfied due to quality issues, we'll make it right.

nonReturnable.title: Non-Returnable Items
nonReturnable.subtitle: Please note that the following items cannot be returned:
nonReturnable.item1: Items that have been opened and used
nonReturnable.item4: Returns initiated after 7 days of delivery

contact.title: Need Help with Returns?
contact.subtitle: Our customer service team is here to help with any return or exchange questions.

meta.description: Learn about Nan Ayeyar's shipping options, delivery areas, and delivery times. Free shipping on orders over 300,000 MMK.

hero.title: Shipping Information
hero.subtitle: Fast, reliable delivery of premium rice to your doorstep across Myanmar

options.title: Shipping Options
options.subtitle: Choose the delivery option that works best for you

standard.title: Standard Delivery
standard.description: Reliable delivery service for all your rice orders

areas.title: Delivery Areas
areas.subtitle: We deliver to major cities and regions across Myanmar

other.title: Other Cities
other.description: Major cities and towns across Myanmar

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.subtitle: Flexible payment options for your convenience

cod.title: Cash on Delivery (COD)
cod.description: Pay with cash when your order arrives. Available for all delivery areas.

online.title: Online Transfer
online.description: Pay via bank transfer or mobile payment apps. AYA Bank, KBZ Bank, AYA Pay, KBZ Pay accepted.

tips.title: Shipping Tips
tips.subtitle: To ensure the best delivery experience:
tips.tip1: Provide accurate and complete delivery address
tips.tip2: Ensure someone is available to receive the order during business hours
tips.tip3: Keep your phone accessible for delivery coordination
tips.tip4: Check your order upon delivery and report any issues immediately

contact.title: Shipping Questions?
contact.subtitle: Contact us for any shipping inquiries or delivery assistance.

meta.description: Learn about Nan Ayeyar - your trusted source for premium rice varieties. Discover our story, values, and commitment to quality.

hero.title: About Nan Ayeyar
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in premium rice, bringing quality and tradition to your table

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Nan Ayeyar was founded with a simple mission: to bring the finest quality rice from Myanmar's most trusted farmers directly to your table. We believe that every grain tells a story of tradition, quality, and care.
story.paragraph2: Our journey began in the heart of Myanmar's rice-growing regions, where we established direct relationships with local farmers who share our commitment to sustainable farming practices and premium quality.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to serve customers across Myanmar, offering a carefully curated selection of rice varieties that represent the best of our agricultural heritage.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: We source only the finest rice varieties and maintain strict quality standards from farm to table.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: We support local farmers and communities, ensuring fair trade and sustainable agricultural practices.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We're committed to environmentally friendly practices and supporting sustainable farming methods.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service, from product selection to customer care.

stats.title: Our Impact
stats.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to quality and service

features.title: Why Choose Us
features.subtitle: What sets us apart in the rice industry

delivery.title: Fast Delivery
delivery.description: Quick and reliable delivery service to ensure your rice arrives fresh and on time.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: Every product comes with our quality guarantee. We stand behind the quality of our rice.

service.title: Customer Service
service.description: Dedicated customer support team ready to help you with any questions or concerns.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide premium quality rice while supporting local farmers and promoting sustainable agricultural practices in Myanmar.

quality.title: Our Quality Promise
quality.subtitle: We guarantee the highest standards in every grain
quality.promise1: Direct sourcing from trusted local farmers
quality.promise3: Proper storage and handling to maintain freshness
quality.promise4: Transparent pricing with no hidden costs

guarantee.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, we'll make it right.

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.message: Are you sure you want to proceed?
